description: Complete backup of Saunamo configurator state - FINAL rendered state as shown in configurator

options.title: According to selected heater
options.description: Heater stones quantity and price calculated based on selected heater model

pricingCalculation.description: Price calculated based on selected heater model (kg / 20kg × £29.50 per package)
pricingCalculation.calculationLogic: Extract kg from selected heater title, divide by 20, multiply by £29.50

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: Review your selections and generate a quote

quoteSettings.termsAndConditions: This quote is valid for the specified period. Prices are subject to change without notice. Payment terms: Net 30 days.
quoteSettings.paymentTerms: Payment is due within 30 days of invoice date. Late payments may incur additional fees.
quoteSettings.footerText: Thank you for your interest. For questions, please contact us at the information above.

heaterStonesCalculation.calculationLogic: Extract kg from selected heater title, divide by 20, multiply by £29.50
heaterStonesCalculation.titleTransformation: According to selected heater -> Heater stones

lightingMultiplierLogic.description: Lighting options with 'Nx' in title use base option price × multiplier

priceSync.description: Prices synced from Pipedrive product catalog before quote generation
priceSync.fallback: If Pipedrive price is 0 or missing, uses option's default price

vatCalculation.description: VAT rate extracted from Pipedrive product or uses quoteSettings.taxRate
vatCalculation.calculation: Item price × quantity × VAT rate = VAT amount
vatCalculation.totalVat: Sum of all item VAT amounts

discountApplication.description: Discounts from active campaigns applied to subtotal
